text: Screening coverage Definition: At the population level, the cervical cancer screening coverage is the number of screening-eligible women undergoing screening in a defined time frame divided by the total number of screening-eligible women during the same time frame and multiplied by $1 0 0 ;$ the time frame is equal to the defined screening interval or the reporting period.
